biotools.summary:
Python-based bespoke microscopy for bio-medical science.

Cockpit is a microscope graphical user interface. It is a flexible and easy to extend platform aimed at life scientists using bespoke microscopes. More detailed information is available:.

Micron Advanced Imaging Consortium.

Micron Advanced Imaging ConsortiumMicron Advanced Imaging ConsortiumMicron Advanced Imaging Consortium.
